# Aluminum Solutions

> Premium Aluminum Railings, Glass Enclosures, and Custom Exterior Solutions in Toronto & GTA.

## About
Aluminum Solutions is a factory-direct manufacturer and installer of high-quality aluminum and glass products. We specialize in modernizing homes with durable, maintenance-free solutions.

## Core Services
- **Aluminum Railings**: [https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/railings](https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/railings) - Rust-free, powder-coated railings for decks and porches.
- **Glass Railings**: [https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/glass-railings](https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/glass-railings) - Frameless and post systems for unobstructed views.
- **Glass Enclosures**: [https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/glass-enclosures](https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/glass-enclosures) - Wind protection for porches and patios.
- **Pool Fences**: [https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/pool-fences](https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/pool-fences) - Safe, code-compliant glass pool enclosures.
- **Privacy Screens**: [https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/privacy-screens](https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/privacy-screens) - Acid-etched glass for urban privacy.
- **Aluminum Columns**: [https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/columns](https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/columns) - Structural and decorative replacements for wood columns.
- **Custom Showers & Mirrors**: [https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/showers](https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/showers) - Bespoke glass shower enclosures and custom mirrors.
- **Glass Walls & Partitions**: [https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/glass-walls](https://aluminumsolutions.ca/services/glass-walls) - Modern glass dividers for offices and homes.
